languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, к кораблю приближается транспортный шаттл с маркировкой Адептус Механикус. Делегация магоса Тарзуса намеревается высадиться на наш борт и получить аудиенцию Вашей Светлости... Именно так они эти сформулировали. Намеревается, а не смиренно просит".

"Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, к кораблю приближается транспортный шаттл с маркировкой Адептус Механикус. Делегация магоса Тарзуса намеревается высадиться на наш борт и получить аудиенцию Вашей Светлости... Именно так они эти сформулировали. Намеревается, а не смиренно просит".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

"Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

"Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

"Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

"Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

languages.text: “舰长大人，一艘带有机械修会标志的舰船正在接近我们的舰船。塔祖斯贤者的代表团要求登上我们的舰船，与舰长大人您见面……这是他们的原话。塔祖斯贤者并非谦卑地‘请求’与您见面，而是‘要求’与您见面。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，一艘带有机械修会标志的舰船正在接近我们的舰船。塔祖斯贤者的代表团要求登上我们的舰船，与舰长大人您见面……这是他们的原话。塔祖斯贤者并非谦卑地‘请求’与您见面，而是‘要求’与您见面。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、帝国技術局の印を付けた輸送用シャトルが船に近づいています。マゴス・ターザスの使節団がこの船に乗り込み、陛下と会見したいと…まさにこのように申しております。慎ましい依頼ではなく、そうするつもりであると」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、帝国技術局の印を付けた輸送用シャトルが船に近づいています。マゴス・ターザスの使節団がこの船に乗り込み、陛下と会見したいと…まさにこのように申しております。慎ましい依頼ではなく、そうするつもりであると」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, une navette de transport appartenant à l'Adeptus Mechanicus approche du vaisseau. La délégation du magos Tarzus entend monter à notre bord et obtenir une audience avec Votre Seigneurie... C'est exactement ainsi qu'on nous a présenté les choses. Il ne demande pas humblement, il entend. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, une navette de transport appartenant à l'Adeptus Mechanicus approche du vaisseau. La délégation du magos Tarzus entend monter à notre bord et obtenir une audience avec Votre Seigneurie... C'est exactement ainsi qu'on nous a présenté les choses. Il ne demande pas humblement, il entend. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, se acerca una lanzadera de transporte con las marcas del Adeptus Mechanicus. La delegación del magos Tarzus pretende subirse a bordo de nuestra nave y celebrar una audiencia con usted... Esas son sus palabras exactas. Dice que "pretende", no lo pide con amabilidad».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, se acerca una lanzadera de transporte con las marcas del Adeptus Mechanicus. La delegación del magos Tarzus pretende subirse a bordo de nuestra nave y celebrar una audiencia con usted... Esas son sus palabras exactas. Dice que "pretende", no lo pide con amabilidad».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ein Transportshuttle mit der Kennzeichnung des Adeptus Mechanicus nähert sich dem Schiff. Magos Tarzus' Delegation wird für eine Audienz bei Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} an Bord kommen ... Genau so lautete die Formulierung. Er wird kommen, er bittet nicht bescheiden darum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ein Transportshuttle mit der Kennzeichnung des Adeptus Mechanicus nähert sich dem Schiff. Magos Tarzus' Delegation wird für eine Audienz bei Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} an Bord kommen ... Genau so lautete die Formulierung. Er wird kommen, er bittet nicht bescheiden darum."

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus nişanlarını taşıyan bir mekik, gemiye yaklaşıyor Lord Kaptan. Magos Tarzus, heyetiyle birlikte gemiye çıkıp şahsınızla görüşmek niyetindeymiş... Sözleri tam olarak böyleydi. Rica etmiyormuş, niyeti o yöndeymiş."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a transport shuttle bearing the markings of the Adeptus Mechanicus is approaching the ship. Magos Tarzus's delegation intends to board our ship and gain an audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... This is exactly how they phrased it. He intends, not humbly requests."
